actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Act to require compact states transporting waste to a compact's disposal facility to use routes within that compact.

summary.text: Amends the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Act to require States transporting low-level radioactive waste to a regional disposal facility established under an interstate compact to use routes within the borders of the States that are parties to the compact.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Low-Level Radioactive Waste Policy Act to require compact states transporting waste to a compact's disposal facility to use routes within that compact.
